DateText: 10th century AH/AD 16th century-12th century AH/AD 18th century
Title: Calligraphic Page with Verses from Chapter 4 of the Qur'an
Medium: ink and pigments on paper mounted on thin pasteboard
Description: This calligraphic page from Walters manuscript W.672 contains verses from chapter 4 (Surat al-nisa') 4:103-106 and is framed by an outer border of marbled paper.
Keywords: Koran; Prayer; Qur`an; Islamic; Ottoman; Book; Calligraphy; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Accordion book; Album; Turkey; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Attributed to Seyh Hamdullah (Islamic, 1436 (?)-1520)
